name: Parking Fever
description:
Have you ever got the fever of parking, Have it here in this amazing Car parking game with realistic simulation.

How to play:-

Drive the car and park it to the middle of rectangular area.

Controls:- 

Use Arrow keys to move the car.

Features:-

:- Realistic car simulation and car movement

:- Pleasant Graphics (Graphics will get updates soon)

:- 10+ Challenging levels

Instructions:-

Starting of game may take some time.

This is a Desktop game and Mobile version will release soon.

------------------------------------------------------------

Programmed and Designed by Gameolution
